versions.release_notes:
· Join our #LiveWithoutCashMovement by referring a friend through the login screen. Win prizes by referring fellow ICICI Bank accountholders
· Now activate #SmartKeys from the login screen and send money while you chat on your favourite apps
· For the first time in India, purchase an ICICI Prudential Life Insurance policy on iMobile
· Users with Dual SIM devices can choose their registered SIM during Activation
· InstaBanking now has cash deposit option for Rs. 2000 denomination available

We received an overwhelming response from our iMobile users on UPI & SmartKeys features recently being launched.

UPI: It is the easiest way to send & receive money. You can also use it to pay at your nearby store!

SmartKeys: First in Asia to enable mobile banking from a smartphone keyboard. Make payment while chatting - Just switch your keyboard to pay!

Introducing Scan to Pay: A secure & cashless payment by scanning mVISA & UPI QR codes at merchant outlets. No need to swipe your card now
Now surprise your loved one with Expression Gift Card feature available under Cards, Loans & Forex.
Now, you can upload additional documents for Loan through iMobile
Experience our enhanced Bill Pay & Mutual Fund section
View your account details like IFSC Code, MMID & Branch address under Accounts & Deposits
iMobile SmartKeys enhanced user experience

· Introducing iMobile SmartKeys: First in Asia to enable mobile banking from a smartphone keyboard. Make payment while chatting - Just switch your keyboard to pay!
· Introducing ICICI Bank Chatbot Beta: You can now chat with our Beta Chatbot service to send money, pay bills & recharge. Use the chat icon on the dashboard.
· A completely new login page with personalized offers.
· Introducing payments through Unified Payment Interface (UPI) on iMobile
· Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Introducing payments through Unified Payment Interface (UPI) on iMobile.

ICICI Bank is the first bank to provide UPI integrated on its mobile banking app.

Download imobile and create your unique VPA* now (Virtual Payment Address, e.g. abc@icici). Use it to transact (send , request and receive money) using UPI.

* You may create a VPA using alphabets, numbers or special characters ( "." only). It's not mandatory to use combination of all three for creation of a VPA.

1.Bill Pay Reminders: You can now set reminders for your Quick Bill Pay transactions using iMobile. This service reminds you of bill payment date so that you don’t miss paying your bills.
2.Tax Payment: Introducing Tax Payment through iMobile. Now you can pay your Advance Tax through an app for the first time in India.
3. Buy Insurance: Introducing Motor Insurance on iMobile. Now buy Travel & Motor Insurance from ICICI Lombard.
4. iDirect: Now access your iDirect portfolio through iMobile app.

1. Introducing Tax Payment through iMobile. Now you can pay your Advance Tax through an app for the first time in India
2. Introducing Motor Insurance on iMobile. Now buy Travel & Motor Insurance from ICICI Lombard
3. Now choose your recharge plan during your mobile recharge transaction.Use Popular Recharge link on the Mobile Recharge Page
4. Users having Home Loan relationship can place a request for their next partial Disbursement.Also track any new loan application in the loans section

1.Book rail tickets through IRCTC services using Shopping tab
2.Buy Travel Insurance from ICICI Bank Lombard through General Insurance
3.Buy & access Mutual Fund Portfolio through Investment & Insurance section for customers registered under Invest@ease
4.Find the dining related offers in nearby restaurants through Offers menu
5.Use Positive Pay feature to secure your physical cheques issued from your ICICI Bank account through Services menu
6. Bug Fixes

1.Book rail tickets through IRCTC services using Shopping tab
2.Buy Travel Insurance from ICICI Bank Lombard through General Insurance
3.Buy & access Mutual Fund Portfolio through Investment & Insurance section for customers registered under Invest@ease
4.Find the dining related offers in nearby restaurants through Offers menu
5.Personalize Interface for Private Banking customers
6.Use Positive Pay feature to secure your physical cheques issued from your ICICI Bank account through Services menu

1.Now users with only Loan relationships with Bank can also activate iMobile and access various loan related services
2.Users can personalize their debit card by uploading their own pics or choosing a pic from a gallery of 200+ designs
3.Surprise your loved one by sending Physical/ Digital Gift Vouchers through Shopping section. You may choose any voucher from variety of merchants available
4.Generate your credit card PIN on a realtime basis by using option available under Services
5.Bug fixes

1.Now users with only Loan relationships with Bank can also activate iMobile and access various loan related services
2.Users can personalize their debit card by uploading their own pics or choosing a pic from a gallery of 200+ designs
3.Surprise your loved one by sending Physical/ Digital Gift Vouchers through Shopping section. You may choose any voucher from variety of merchants available
4.Generate your credit card PIN on a realtime basis by using option available under Services
5.Bug fixes

1.Now users can convert their credit card transactions into EMI by using option available under Credit Card - More Options.
2.Now users can pay their education, housing society maintenance or any other bills available with merchants tied up under Eazypay by using " Pay Other Bills (Eazypay)" tab in Bill Payment.
3. View your TDS Certificate by using Account Services tab
4.Now users can determine their risk appetite by using Investment Profile tab available under Investment & Insurance section.

Onboarding users with only credit card relationship
Introducing Forex services to book and reload a travel card.
Now Buy Mutual Fund and other features specific to iWealth app by navigating through My iWealth
Now you can save tax and earn high returns with Tax Saver FD option available under Open FD
Now users can reset limit for their Debit Card by using " Increase/ Decrease Debit Card Limit" option available under Cards Services.
Modified flow for Applying for Credit Card accounts

Onboarding users with only credit card relationship
Introducing Forex services to book and reload a travel card.
Now Buy Mutual Fund and other features specific to iWealth app by navigating through My iWealth
Now you can save tax and earn high returns with Tax Saver FD option available under Open FD
Now users can reset limit for their Debit Card by using " Increase/ Decrease Debit Card Limit" option available under Cards Services.
Modified flow for Applying for Credit Card accounts

1. Introducing Forex services to book and reload a travel card and apply for Foreign Exchange currency on the go.
2. Now Buy Mutual Fund and other features specific to iWealth app by navigating through My iWealth, Investments and Insurance Section.
3. Improved buying experience for Personal Loan against your Credit Card in the Credit Card section.
4. Simplified flow for Other Bank Payee addition for quicker Fund Transfer.
5. iMobile goes global- iMobile can now be used by our NRI customers also.

1. iMobile goes global- iMobile can now be used by our NRI customers also. Just choose the NRI Customer option below activation to activate imobile for your NRI savings account.

2. Now you can generate or change the PIN for your ATM/ Debit Card by navigating through Services section.

3. Enhanced the Fund Transfer and Services screen for easier usage.

4. Now you can update your Aadhar number at an ICICI Bank branch by placing a request through Insta Banking section of iMobile.

1. New functionality for reissue of a Debit card through the services section.

2. Integrated the unique Instabanking mobile app within iMobile on the login page. Through this service one can initiate a branch transaction and then proceed to branch to complete it. No need to wait at the branch.

store_info.title: iMobile by ICICI Bank
store_info.description:
iMobile is ICICI Bank’s official mobile banking application.

iMobile, the most comprehensive and secure Mobile Banking application, getting payments done through Unified Payment Interface (UPI), offers over 100 banking services on your mobile.

The features of the new iMobile are:

Pay and collect money from anyone instantly using Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
View and transact from all your accounts including Loans, PPF, iWish, Insurance, Cards and Deposits
Check your bank balance, view & email detailed statement and view passbook on your mobile
Transfer funds to an account or to contact no or email id
Send cash through ICICI Bank’s Cardless Cash facility
Transact superfast using Favourite feature. By tagging a transaction as favorite, you can quickly access and complete your transactions like mobile recharge or fund transfer
Connect directly to ICICI Bank Phone Banking Officer from your mobile phone application
Track your deliverables
Open FD – Open FDs, RDs or iWish deposits
Get personalized offers on your mobile
Access and manage Life Insurance policies
Service At Your Convenience: Avail banking services from the comfort of your home. You can locate an ATM, stop or check status of your cheque, order a cheque book, track your service requests and more.

Now you can also view the following details on your Smart watch by using iWear - ICICI Bank's Android Wear Banking application:
• Information about your Bank and Credit Card accounts
• Balance details and last 3 transactions

iWear is a companion app that works only when user has downloaded Android Wear to their mobile devices.
iWear offers banking and informational services to make a simplified banking experience as never before.

For more details on ICICI Bank Mobile Banking visit http://www.icicibank.com/mobile-banking/index.html.

Legal Terms and conditions: http://www.icicibank.com/terms-condition/terms-and-conditions.page?

Now NRI Customers can also use iMobile App, More details about iMobile for NRI here: http://www.icicibank.com/nri-banking/mobile-banking/imobile.page?

For any feedback, queries or issues pertaining to iMobile application please write to mobileapps@icicibank.com
store_info.short_description: Now iMobile with UPI - your Bank on the move

reviews.title: App is good. Only 1 issue related to Login
reviews.body: Why does the keyboard closes itself after the pin. Let it be open because sometimes I want to quickly login by tapping the button but by the time I tap keyboard is closed and I click on pin instead of submit button

reviews.title: Best Banking App
reviews.body: This is the best banking app. It allow you to do lots of thing thru mobile. U don't need to go bank. U will get everything in a minute. Upgraded version is awsum. I jz love this app...

reviews.title: Very poor app
reviews.body: Unable to pay bill of my credit card of external bank (hdfc) .  I would give zero star if there would be option in Google store. This stupid app wasted my time nd data. ICICI Bank's services are poor in all expect.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.body: Ok

reviews.title: payee list gone
reviews.body: unable to do fund transfer as it does not show registered payee list

reviews.title: Crashes like anything. Wish there is zero star option..
reviews.body: Highly unstable app. Crashes in mid of transaction...  Tests your patience while loading data, even when using on 4mbps wifi.... CITI or even SBI bank apps are better than this

reviews.title: Not able to get my account
reviews.body: It is picking some other accounts which are not mine. I have verified my mobile number by sending sms. This phone number is already registered with icici bank from last 10yrs

The activate option is not working properly. Whenever i update the app, its again and again asking me to activate. Last time, I enabled with internet banking user Id. Now again, its asking me to activate. SMS not received. And still showing the second page. No "back" option.
Can we activate from unregistered mobile no??

Finally there is an option available for NRIs. Unfortunately, it doesn't work. After I click on the Activate button (for NRIs), I receive an email with OTP. But the app does not provide a screen for OTP. It remains at the screen where the activate button is seen and it stays there.   When even the public sector banks like SBI have new android apps that let users login using internet baking credentials, ICIC one of the largest private banks still uses SMS based authentication (useless for NRIs) . And even this is not available by default. User has to request for mobile banking access. ICICI should look back at their mobile banking app and come up with a new app which is on par with other banks.
Awesome

Not able to get that screen to enter the password. very pathetic!! Take immediate action if u guys really care NRE customers. Remove ur slogon " Khayal aapka" Very disgusting
